items.title: Settlement agreed in Celtic Boys Club abuse cases
items.description: More than 20 former players involved in a class action have received a seven-figure sum.

items.title: Celtic issue 'very sorry' statement after Boys Club abuse cases settled for seven-figure sum
items.description: The Parkhead club said it is "appalled by any form of historic abuse" and "is very sorry that these events took place at Celtic Boys Club" after a seven-figure settlement was reached in more than 20 cases.

items.title: Celtic 'appalled' by abuse at Boys Club as they confirm settlement
items.description: Celtic have confirmed that a settlement has been reached with "a number" of victims of child abuse, and issued another apology

items.title: Celtic have done the right thing over Boys Club scandal but they should have done it far sooner – Keith Jackson
items.description: The current regime cannot be blamed in any way for the criminal and repugnant actions of these ghouls and bogeymen from Celtic’s past
